name: The Biking Dead: Ride, Shoot & Crash!
name_original: The Biking Dead: Ride, Shoot & Crash!
description:
BRAAAIINNNS!! You are one of the last zombie heroes! Can you survive and escape the machines and other zombies trying to kill you?

***** "Looks awesome!" - Toby Turner (Tobuscus) *****

Player reviews:

"5/5 - I absolutely love it! It's like 'Happy Wheels' with zombies!"
"5/5 - Best undead game available"
"5/5 - A lot of cool things. Zombies, motorcycles & guns that shoot you"
"5/5 - A mobile masterpiece"
"5/5 - Hilarious with parts flying"
"5/5 - One of the best bike games I've ever played"
"5/5 - Best fun my family has had together on the iPhone. Lmao"
"5/5 - This game makes me laugh out loud"
"5/5 - Soooooo fun!! Great rag doll effects "

=================================

RIDE INTO RIDICULOUSLY DANGEROUS DANGER
- For the future of zombiekind

CRASH THROUGH ZOMBIE SPECTATORS
- It's for the greater good. They're dead anyway

EXPERIENCE REAL ZOMBIE PHYSICS
- Zombie ragdoll physics, indistinguishable from real-life zombie physics

UNLOCK & UPGRADE UNIQUE VEHICLES
- Go further than nature ever intended!

COLLECT WEAPONS, HEROES AND OUTFITS
- Uncover rare and powerful undead heroes, and get them killed!

ENJOY SIMPLE CONTROLS
- Pick up and play with 2 button controls. Or leave it on your lap, it's up to you!

COMPETE AGAINST FRIENDS
- Facebook, Game Center Leaderboards, and over-the-shoulder play

SHOW YOUR SKILL
- Die with style and earn more by riding with flips and stunts


***** AMAZING FEATURES *****

+ Tons of Missions, can you complete them all?
+ 12 Vehicles to Unlock and Upgrade, with unique handling!
+ 30+ Heroes to Discover and Collect!
+ Ride into a dangerous world with realistic physics
+ Share video replays of your best (worst?) rides!
+ Beautiful hand-drawn retina-optimized art
+ Audio from "Game of the Year" winning sound designer, Joonas Turner
+ Music by Joshua Kaplan of ’Plague Inc' fame

AND MORE!
- Tons of exciting updates to come - more maps, vehicles, and items!


THE BIKING DEAD - from SPACE INCH and PUREPLAY STUDIOS

Download now for FREE!
